Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalBoard.market

Class Market

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.GameMasterObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalBoard.market.Market
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable<MarketObserver>
public class Market
extends GameMasterObservable
implements Observable<MarketObserver>
Game Market in which a player can insert a marble in the marketTray to acquire resources.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Market​(int numRow, int numCol, java.util.ArrayList<Marble> allMarbles)
    Constructs a Market with the specified number of rows and columns and inserts the marbles contained in allMarbles, the last marble in allMarbles will be the marbleToInsert.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Add a resource in the array that will be send to the resource manager.

    Add observer in the observers array.

    Return a copy of the resources got from market.

    Return the number of white marble drew.
    int getWhiteMarbleToTransform()  
    void increaseWhiteMarbleDrew()
    Increase the value that track the number of white marbles drew.
    void insertLeaderResources​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resources)
    Insert resources in resourcesToSend, this method is called by the MarbleEffect of a Leader Card.
    void insertMarbleInCol​(int col)
    Insert the extra marble in a specific column of the market tray and call the action of every marble in that column.
    void insertMarbleInRow​(int row)
    Insert the extra marble in a specific row of the market tray and call the action of every marble in that row.

    Reset the market after it's been used

  • Constructor Details

    • Market

      public Market​(int numRow, int numCol, java.util.ArrayList<Marble> allMarbles) throws WrongMarketDimensionException, WrongMarblesNumberException
      Constructs a Market with the specified number of rows and columns and inserts the marbles contained in allMarbles, the last marble in allMarbles will be the marbleToInsert.
      Parameters:
      numCol - number of columns
      numRow - number of rows
      allMarbles - array that contains all the marbles of the market
      Throws:
      WrongMarketDimensionException - if it's impossible to create a market with that dimensions
      WrongMarblesNumberException - if the number of marbles does not match with the dimension of the market

  • Method Details

    • addInResourcesToSend

      public void addInResourcesToSend​(Resource resource)
      Add a resource in the array that will be send to the resource manager.
      Parameters:
      resource - resource that need to be added.

    • increaseWhiteMarbleDrew

      public void increaseWhiteMarbleDrew()
      Increase the value that track the number of white marbles drew.

    • getWhiteMarbleDrew

      public int getWhiteMarbleDrew()
      Return the number of white marble drew.
      Returns:
      the number of white marble drew.

    • insertMarbleInRow

      public void insertMarbleInRow​(int row) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, InvalidStateActionException
      Insert the extra marble in a specific row of the market tray and call the action of every marble in that row.
      Parameters:
      row - index of the row in which the marble will be insert.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the selected row does not exist.
      InvalidStateActionException

    • insertMarbleInCol

      public void insertMarbleInCol​(int col) throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException, InvalidStateActionException
      Insert the extra marble in a specific column of the market tray and call the action of every marble in that column.
      Parameters:
      col - is the column in which the marble will be insert.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the selected column does not exist.
      InvalidStateActionException

    • getResourceToSend

      public java.util.ArrayList<Resource> getResourceToSend()
      Return a copy of the resources got from market.
      Returns:
      the array in which the resources are stored.

    • insertLeaderResources

      public void insertLeaderResources​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resources)
      Insert resources in resourcesToSend, this method is called by the MarbleEffect of a Leader Card.
      Parameters:
      resources - array of resources to add.

    • setWhiteMarbleToTransform

      InvalidStateActionException
